column4: can anyone explain why flash is being absolutely retarded for me in 9.10? I cannot click pause on youtube videos, the volume slider is finicky, and videos on pages don't often load if they are embedded flash. Help?
if yuo have sfw plugin also installed for firefox then remove that .
it sometimes messes with the flash plugin
SWF plugin is the only thing powering my flash, if I disable it, flash doesn't play :( Tried installing the plugin by itself, restricted extras, it seems buggy with 3.5.. hmm
